00024 #include "MagnitudeLorentzian.hpp"
00025 #include "MagnitudeLorentzianTestData.hpp"
00026 #include "data/FrequencyData.hpp"
00027 #include "util/unit.hpp"
00028 #include <iostream>

00037 using namespace std;
00038 using namespace pwiz::util;
00039 using namespace pwiz::peaks;
00040 using namespace pwiz::data;
00041 
00042 
00043 ostream* os_ = 0;
00044 double epsilon_ = numeric_limits<double>::epsilon();
00045 
00046 
00047 void testBasic()
00048 {
00049     MagnitudeLorentzian m(1,0,1); // m(x) = 1/sqrt(x^2+1)
00050     unit_assert_equal(m(0), 1, epsilon_);
00051     unit_assert_equal(m(1), 1/sqrt(2.), epsilon_);
00052     unit_assert_equal(m(2), 1/sqrt(5.), epsilon_);
00053     unit_assert_equal(m(3), 1/sqrt(10.), epsilon_);
00054     unit_assert_equal(m(4), 1/sqrt(17.), epsilon_);
00055 
00056     // center == 0, alpha == 2*pi, tau == 1/(2*pi)
00057     unit_assert_equal(m.center(), 0, epsilon_);
00058     unit_assert_equal(m.alpha(), 2*M_PI, epsilon_);
00059     unit_assert_equal(m.tau(), 1/(2*M_PI), epsilon_);
00060 
00061     if (os_) *os_ << "testBasic(): success!\n";
00062 }
00063 
00064 
00065 void testFit()
00066 {
00067     MagnitudeLorentzian ref(1,0,1);
00068 
00069     // choose sample values near 1!
00070     // weighting pow(y,6) gives big roundoff errors
00071 
00072     vector< pair<double,double> > samples;
00073     for (int i=-2; i<3; i++)
00074         samples.push_back(make_pair(i/10.,ref(i/10.)));
00075 
00076     MagnitudeLorentzian m(samples);
00077 
00078     if (os_)
00079     {
00080         *os_ << "coefficients: " << setprecision(14);
00081         copy(m.coefficients().begin(), m.coefficients().end(), ostream_iterator<double>(*os_, " "));
00082         *os_ << endl;
00083 
00084         *os_ << "error: " << m(0)-1 << endl;
00085 
00086         for (int i=0; i<5; i++)
00087             *os_ << i << ", " << m(i) << endl;
00088     }
00089 
00090     unit_assert_equal(m(0), 1, epsilon_*100);
00091     unit_assert_equal(m(1), 1/sqrt(2.), epsilon_*100);
00092     unit_assert_equal(m(2), 1/sqrt(5.), epsilon_*100);
00093     unit_assert_equal(m(3), 1/sqrt(10.), epsilon_*100);
00094     unit_assert_equal(m(4), 1/sqrt(17.), epsilon_*100);
00095     if (os_) *os_ << "testFit(): success!\n";
00096 }
00097 
00098 
00099 void testData()
00100 {
00101     string filename = "MagnitudeLorentizianTest.cfd.temp.txt";
00102     ofstream temp(filename.c_str());
00103     temp << sampleData_;
00104     temp.close();
00105 
00106     FrequencyData fd(filename);
00107     system(("rm " + filename).c_str()); 
00108 
00109     FrequencyData::const_iterator max = fd.max();
00110     if (os_) *os_ << "max: (" << max->x << ", " << abs(max->y) << ")\n";
00111 
00112     // fit MagnitudeLorentzian to 3 points on unnormalized data
00113 
00114     vector< pair<double,double> > samples1;
00115     transform(fd.max()-1, fd.max()+2, back_inserter(samples1), FrequencyData::magnitudeSample);
00116 
00117     if (os_)
00118     {
00119         *os_ << "raw data:\n";
00120         for (unsigned int i=0; i<samples1.size(); i++)
00121             *os_ << "sample " << i << ": (" << samples1[i].first << ", " << samples1[i].second << ")\n";
00122     }
00123 
00124     const MagnitudeLorentzian m1(samples1);
00125 
00126     if (os_)
00127     {
00128         *os_ << "m1: ";
00129         copy(m1.coefficients().begin(), m1.coefficients().end(), ostream_iterator<double>(*os_, " "));
00130         *os_ << endl;
00131         *os_ << "error: " << scientific << m1.leastSquaresError() << endl;
00132 
00133         for (unsigned int i=0; i<samples1.size(); i++)
00134             *os_ << "m1(" << i << ") == " << m1(samples1[i].first) << endl;
00135     }
00136 
00137     // now on normalized data
00138 
00139 
00140     fd.normalize();
00141 
00142     vector< pair<double,double> > samples2;
00143     transform(fd.max()-1, fd.max()+2, back_inserter(samples2), FrequencyData::magnitudeSample);
00144 
00145     if (os_)
00146     {
00147         *os_ << "normalized: \n";
00148         for (unsigned int i=0; i<samples2.size(); i++)
00149             *os_ << "sample " << i << ": (" << samples2[i].first << ", " << samples2[i].second << ")\n";
00150     }
00151 
00152     const MagnitudeLorentzian m2(samples2);
00153 
00154     if (os_)
00155     {
00156         *os_ << "m2: ";
00157         copy(m2.coefficients().begin(), m2.coefficients().end(), ostream_iterator<double>(*os_, " "));
00158         *os_ << endl;
00159         *os_ << "error: " << scientific << m2.leastSquaresError() << endl;
00160 
00161         for (unsigned int i=0; i<samples2.size(); i++)
00162             *os_ << "m2(" << i << ") == " << m2(samples2[i].first) << " [" << fd.scale()*m2(samples2[i].first) << "]\n";
00163     }
00164 
00165     unit_assert_equal(m2.leastSquaresError(), 0, 1e-15);
00166 }
00167 
00168 
00169 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00170 {
00171     try
00172     {
00173         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00174         if (os_) *os_ << "MagnitudeLorentzianTest\n";
00175         testBasic();
00176         testFit();
00177         testData();
00178         return 0;
00179     }
00180     catch (exception &e)
00181     {
00182         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00183         return 1;
00184     }
00185 }
